statements: UPDATE user_profiles SET email='new_email@example.com' WHERE username='john_doe';
UPDATE user_profiles SET profile_picture='image_url' WHERE email='jane@example.com';
UPDATE user_profiles SET email='john.doe@example.com', profile_picture='/images/profile.jpg' WHERE username='johndoe'
UPDATE user_profiles SET profile_picture='/images/profile.png', email='jane.smith@example.com' WHERE username='janesmith'
UPDATE user_profiles SET email='john.doe@example.com' WHERE username='JohnDoe';
UPDATE user_friends SET status=true WHERE user_id=1 AND friend_id=2;
UPDATE user_profiles SET email = 'newemail@example.com', profile_picture = E'\\xDEADBEEF' WHERE username = 'john_doe';
UPDATE user_friends SET user_id = 2, friend_id = 3, status = true WHERE status = false;
UPDATE user_profiles SET email = 'example@gmail.com' WHERE username = 'john_doe';
UPDATE user_activities SET activity_description = 'New activity description' WHERE activity_id = 1234;
UPDATE user_profiles SET email='newemail@example.com', profile_picture='/path/to/new_profile.jpg' WHERE username='john_doe';
UPDATE user_activities SET activity_description='Updated activity description' WHERE user_id=123 AND activity_id=456;
UPDATE user_profiles SET username='john_doe', email='john.doe@example.com' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE posts SET post_content='Hello, this is a new post!' WHERE post_id=3;
UPDATE posts SET post_content = 'Updated post content' WHERE post_id = 123;
UPDATE user_profiles SET email = 'new_email@example.com', profile_picture = 'NewProfilePictureBlob' WHERE id = 456;
UPDATE users SET email = 'newemail@example.com' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE posts SET post_text = 'Updated post text' WHERE post_id = 3;
UPDATE users SET username = 'JohnDoe' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE posts SET post_text = 'Updated post text' WHERE post_id = 5;
